## Splice.adjustTo() method

Adjusts the splice index based on the provided array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
adjustTo(array: any[]): this;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

array


</td><td>

any\[\]


</td><td>

The array to adjust to.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this

The same splice, mutated based on the reference array.
